00035 bool DataBase::DataBaseOpen (wxString path)
00036 {
00037         static char *server_args[] = {
00038                 "this_program",       /* this string is not used */
00039                 "--datadir=/Users/Lucien/DATA/PRJ/TOOLMAP/TestBDD/BDD/data/",
00040                 "--language=./share/english",
00041                 "--skip-innodb",
00042                 "--port=3309",
00043                 "--character-sets-dir=./share/charsets", 
00044                 //"--default-charcater-set=latin1"
00045                 //"--language=french",
00046                 //
00047                 //"--defaults-file=/Users/Lucien/DATA/PRJ/TOOLMAP/TestBDD/BDD/my.ini"
00048         };
00049         static char *server_groups[] = {
00050                 "embedded",
00051                 "server",
00052                 "this_program_SERVER",
00053                 (char *)NULL
00054         };
00055         
00056         int num_elements = (sizeof(server_args) / sizeof(char *));
00057         
00058         
00059         
00060         if(mysql_server_init(num_elements, server_args, server_groups)==0)
00061         {
00062                 pMySQL = mysql_init(NULL);
00063                 
00064                 if(mysql_real_connect(pMySQL,NULL,NULL,NULL,_T("i4418575"),3309,NULL,0))
00065                 {
00066                         IsDatabaseOpen = TRUE;
00067                         return TRUE;
00068                 }       
00069                 
00070         }
00071         
00072         
00073         // if something goes wrong
00074         return FALSE;
00075         
00076         
00077         
00078         
00079 }

00082 {

00084         IsDatabaseOpen = FALSE;

00089 wxArrayString DataBase::DataBaseListTables()
00090 {
00091         MYSQL_RES *results;
00092         MYSQL_ROW record;
00093         wxArrayString myStingArray;
00094         
00095         if(mysql_query(pMySQL,_T("SHOW TABLES;"))==0)
00096         {
00097                 results = mysql_store_result(pMySQL);
00098                 
00099                 while((record = mysql_fetch_row(results)))
00100                 {
00101                         myStingArray.Add(record[0]);
00102                 }
00103                 
00104                 // clean
00105                 mysql_free_result(results);
00106                 
00107         }
00108         return myStingArray;
00109 }

00112 wxString DataBase::DatabaseGetVersion()
00113 {
00114         wxString myVersionString;
00115         myVersionString.Printf(_T("%s"),mysql_get_client_info());
00116         return myVersionString;
00117 }

00125         wxArrayString myStingArray;

00128         {
00129                 results = mysql_store_result(pMySQL);
00130                 while((record = mysql_fetch_row(results)))
00131                 {
00132                         myStingArray.Add(record[0]);
00133                 }

00139                 
00140         }
00141         return myStingArray;

00145 bool DataBase::DataBaseGetAllTableContent(wxString sTable)
00146 {
00147         m_resultNumber = 0;
00148         if (mysql_query(pMySQL,_T("SELECT * FROM ") + sTable)==0) 
00149         {
00150                 pResults = mysql_store_result(pMySQL);
00151                 m_resultNumber = mysql_field_count(pMySQL);
00152                 return TRUE;
00153         }
00154         return FALSE;
00155 }

00158 wxArrayString DataBase::DataBaseGetNextResult()
00159 {
00160         MYSQL_ROW record;
00161         wxArrayString myRowResult;
00162         
00163         if (m_resultNumber > 0 && pResults != NULL); 
00164         {
00165                 if(record = mysql_fetch_row(pResults))
00166                 {
00167                         for (int i = 0; i<m_resultNumber; i++) 
00168                         {
00169                                 myRowResult.Add(record[i]);
00170                         }
00171                 }
00172                 else 
00173                 {
00174                         // clean
00175                         m_resultNumber=0;
00176                         mysql_free_result(pResults);
00177                 }
00178                 
00179         }
00180         
00181         return myRowResult;
00182 
00183 }

00186 int DataBase::DataBaseQuery(wxString myQuery)
00187 {
00188         MYSQL_RES *results;
00189         int iRetour = mysql_query(pMySQL,myQuery);
00190         results = mysql_store_result(pMySQL);
00191         mysql_free_result(results);
00192         return iRetour;
00193 }
